original_text: I sent you away from Jerusalem as prisoners to Babylon. All of you must also listen carefully to my message.’
korean_text: 그런즉 내가 예루살렘에서 바벨론으로 보낸 너희 모든 포로여 여호와의 말씀을 들을지니라

sentences.original_text: I sent you away from Jerusalem as prisoners
All of you must also listen carefully
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 모두도 또한 주의 깊게 들어야 한다
